name: Creamy egg bellpepper sesame
description: Indulge in a savory and healthy meal with our Creamy Egg Bell Pepper Sesame recipe. Tailored for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet, this dish emanates a perfect blend of nutritious ingredients. It promises a delightful culinary experience, making it an excellent choice for health-conscious individuals seeking flavorful yet wholesome meals.

recipeInstructions.text: Thoroughly wash the yellow and red bell peppers under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the yellow and red bell peppers into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, beat the eggs with salt and ground pepper until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced bell peppers to the pan and sauté for about 5 minutes, until they are soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the beaten egg mixture over the sautéed peppers. Let it cook without stirring for 2-3 minutes, until the eggs start to set.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Gently stir the mixture, ensuring the eggs are fully cooked and creamy, about 2 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
